keyMoments.title: Oars Overwhelms the Straw Hat Crew
keyMoments.description: Oars demonstrates his overwhelming power by systematically defeating the entire Straw Hat crew using a combination of his giant strength and Luffy's techniques.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Oars as one of the most dangerous opponents the crew has faced, requiring them to develop new strategies.
keyMoments.quote: I don't know any of you! My master is Moria!

keyMoments.title: Oars Uses Gomu Gomu Techniques
keyMoments.description: Oars demonstrates his ability to use Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Mi techniques including Gomu Gomu no Smash, Kama, and Kazan despite not having Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: Critical demonstration of how dangerous the combination of Oars' size and Luffy's abilities truly is.

keyMoments.title: Oars Defeats the Straw Hat Crew
keyMoments.description: Oars stands victoriously over the defeated Straw Hat Pirates, proclaiming his allegiance to Gecko Moria.
keyMoments.significance: One of the rare complete defeats of the Straw Hat crew, raising the stakes for the arc's resolution.
keyMoments.quote: I am a servant of Master Moria!

statusHistory.reason: Zombie animated by Gecko Moria with Luffy's shadow

abilities.description: Oars uses Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Smash technique, utilizing the rubber-like fighting style granted by Luffy's shadow.
Oars performs a scythe-like attack mimicking Luffy's fighting style.
Oars uses a volcano-themed attack from Luffy's repertoire.

relationships.description: Oars serves Gecko Moria as his ultimate zombie creation, implanted with Luffy's shadow.

evolutionMoments.description: Oars repeatedly declares his loyalty to Moria while fighting the Straw Hats.

reveals.information: Can use Luffy's Gomu Gomu techniques through his implanted shadow

keyMoments.title: Robin's Cien Fleurs: Spider Net
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Cien Fleurs: Spider Net to catch Zoro after Oars kicks him high into the air, and later uses extra arms to restrain Oars temporarily.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's crucial support role in protecting teammates while attempting to control the battlefield.

keyMoments.title: Robin Injured by Brick Bat
keyMoments.description: Robin is injured and knocked down by Gecko Moria's Brick Bat attack while it's targeting Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the collateral damage of Moria's reckless attacks and the danger the crew faces.

abilities.description: Robin creates a net made of one hundred arms to catch falling allies or create barriers.

keyMoments.title: Sanji's Collier Frit Against Oars
keyMoments.description: Sanji attempts to appeal to Luffy's personality within Oars, then attacks with Collier Frit, though Oars blocks it with his forehead.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's emotional connection to Luffy and his willingness to try reaching his captain's consciousness.
keyMoments.quote: Listen, you've got to remember who you are! You're our captain!

keyMoments.title: Oars Squeezes Sanji
keyMoments.description: Oars grabs Sanji in his massive hand and squeezes him, nearly crushing him before Usopp's intervention.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the life-threatening power difference between Oars and individual crew members.

abilities.description: A powerful kick aimed at the opponent's neck area.

keyMoments.title: Usopp's Fire Bird Star
keyMoments.description: Usopp fires his Fire Bird Star at Oars' face, saving Sanji from being crushed and temporarily setting Oars on fire.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's role as sniper support and his ability to provide crucial saves in desperate moments.

keyMoments.title: Wanted Poster Recognition
keyMoments.description: Usopp hopes Oars won't recognize him since his wanted poster shows Sogeking, but Oars identifies him anyway.
keyMoments.significance: Provides comic relief while referencing the ongoing gag about Usopp's Sogeking wanted poster.
keyMoments.quote: He might have a chance since his face looks nothing like the face on his wanted poster!

keyMoments.title: Salt Ball Attempt
keyMoments.description: Usopp fires a salt ball into Oars' mouth while Robin restrains him, attempting to purify the zombie.
keyMoments.significance: Shows tactical thinking and application of zombie weaknesses, though ineffective against Oars' scale.

abilities.description: A flaming projectile that Usopp fires from his slingshot, effective for causing fire damage.

keyMoments.title: Moria Evades Luffy
keyMoments.description: Moria continues evading Luffy's pursuit using Doppelman and Brick Bat attacks rather than fighting directly.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Moria's cowardly but effective fighting strategy of letting others do the fighting.
keyMoments.quote: Get back here and fight me, Moria!

keyMoments.title: Moria's Brick Bat Attack
keyMoments.description: Moria uses Brick Bat, transforming his shadow into bat-like projectiles that injure Robin and attack Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Moria's Devil Fruit versatility and his recklessness with collateral damage.

keyMoments.title: Moria Dismisses Thriller Bark's Destruction
keyMoments.description: When Hildon warns about Thriller Bark being destroyed by Oars' rampage, Moria dismissively tells him to fix it himself.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Moria's callous attitude toward his subordinates and willingness to sacrifice his island to defeat the Straw Hats.

abilities.description: Transforms his shadow into numerous bat-like projectiles that attack opponents.
Creates a shadow clone that can fight independently and rise from other shadows.

relationships.description: Moria controls Oars as his ultimate zombie creation.

keyMoments.title: Hildon Gets Kissed by Absalom
keyMoments.description: Hildon accidentally flies into the wedding ceremony at the wrong moment and gets kissed by Absalom instead of Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Provides comic relief and karmic justice for Absalom's creepy behavior.

keyMoments.title: Hildon Reports to Moria
keyMoments.description: Hildon reports to Moria that Oars is destroying Thriller Bark, but Moria dismisses his concerns.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the hierarchy of the Thriller Bark Pirates and Moria's disregard for his subordinates.
keyMoments.quote: If this keeps up, Thriller Bark will be destroyed!

statusHistory.reason: Zombie bat servant of Gecko Moria
